bic: While Remus was=
 following Deadfur, they were suprise from behind
by a voice.

eclared : Name: Remus! And you will not
know my affiliation!

The bot said =
to a tall transmetal bot : Lord razorwing we foun someone
who will interest=
ed you my lord.

Razorwing turned around hastly and came to look in the eye=
s of remus.
He was taller and wider than him. His red arms seem's like fire=
 coming
out of his blue transmetal body. From those arms, a long canon wher=
e
looking like some kind of canon with a "V" type of form to end it.
From h=
is position Remus could only see was Razorwing britly yellow
eyes starring =
into is own. 

Razorwing: The only reason your not under arrest right now i=
s because
your with Deadfure. So Shut the hell up if you dont want to end u=
p scrap.

Remus knew is situation was to unclear to everyone to do anything=
. He
wasn't even sure what to do so for now he decide to stay low profile.

Sorry fo=
r the bad reception but I'm clearing this mess, so if you want
to stay here=
